[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of Statement of financial position, current/non-current but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentNonfinancialAssets, ifrs-full:OtherNoncurrentFinancialLiabilities, ifrs-full:CurrentTaxLiabilitiesCurrent, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentFinancialLiabilities, ifrs-full:NoncurrentProvisions, ifrs-full:IssuedCapital, ifrs-full:OtherNoncurrentFinancialAssets, ifrs-full:NoncurrentAssets, ifrs-full:Inventories, ifrs-full:Goodwill, ifrs-full:NoncurrentLiabilities, ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalents, ifrs-full:CurrentProvisions, ifrs-full:InvestmentProperty, ifrs-full:PropertyPlantAndEquipment, ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings, ifrs-full:CurrentAssets, arcticpaper:OtherReservesExcludingReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation, arcticpaper:SupplementaryCapital, ifrs-full:Assets, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentFinancialAssets, ifrs-full:CurrentTaxAssetsCurrent, ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill, ifrs-full:OtherNoncurrentNonfinancialAssets, ifrs-full:TradeAndOtherCurrentReceivables, ifrs-full:DeferredTaxLiabilities, ifrs-full:DeferredTaxAssets, ifrs-full:TradeAndOtherCurrentPayables, ifrs-full:CurrentLiabilities All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of Additional Information but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInTradeAndOtherReceivables, ifrs-full:ProceedsFromNoncurrentBorrowings, ifrs-full:DividendsRecognisedAsDistributionsToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:PurchaseOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillInvestmentPropertyAndOtherNoncurrentAssets, ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughAppropriationOfRetainedEarnings, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInIncreaseDecreaseInCurrentBorrowings, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInTradeAndOtherPayables, ifrs-full:RepaymentsOfNoncurrentBorrowings, ifrs-full:ProceedsFromDisposalsOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillInvestmentPropertyAndOtherNoncurrentAssets, ifrs-full:RevenueFromSaleOfGoods, ifrs-full:DividendsPaidToNoncontrollingInterestsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of Statement of Cash Flows, indirect method but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. arcticpaper:AdjustmentsForCogenerationCertificates, ifrs-full:InterestPaidClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:OtherAdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLoss, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:PaymentsOfLeaseLiabilitiesClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForLossesGainsOnDisposalOfNoncurrentAssets, ifrs-full:ProfitLoss, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForProvisions, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities, ifrs-full:OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsFinancingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInInventories, ifrs-full:CashFlowsUsedInObtainingControlOfSubsidiariesOrOtherBusinessesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivities, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForUnrealisedForeignExchangeLossesGains, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense, arcticpaper:AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInAccrualsAndDeferredIncome, ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForFinanceCosts All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -
